5. Article 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the substitution of 

the following paragraph (f): 

“(f) the review of relevant findings and recommendations of the National 
Oversight and Audit Commission and the response of the Chief 
Executive, and, where applicable, in the case of Limerick City and 
County Council, the Mayor, to such findings and recommendations; and 
take further action as appropriate; and

title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S. I. No. 408 of 2020);
heading: 6. Article 11 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the substitution of
text_raw:
6. Article 11 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the substitution of 

the following sub-article (2): 

“(2) The audit committee shall meet separately at least annually with— 

(a) the Local Government Auditor, 

(b) employees of the internal audit unit of the local authority, 

(c) the Chief Executive, and 

(d) as appropriate to his or her functions, in the case of Limerick 

City and County Council, the Mayor.”

7. Article 15 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the substitution of 

the following sub-article (2): 

“(2) On completion of the report prepared under paragraph (1), it shall 
be the duty of the Chairperson to send copies to the Chief Executive, in 
the case of Limerick City and County Council, to the Mayor, and to the 
local authority for consideration at the next practicable meeting.” 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 29 May 2024 

ALAN DILLON 
 Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local 

Government and Heritage.
